title: Ivy's Bind
description: After the way his summer ended, Jack doesn’t know what to think. His grandmother isn’t answering any questions, and the silent Ms. Mopat still hasn’t said a word. Jack goes to school, and pretends he’s a regular teenager, but he can’t help worrying about the things he’s seen. Jack’s scars won’t let him forget, but he’s left with no choice, except to wait for summer... when Mr. Ryan and Ivy are supposed to return.Ivy's Bind is the second book in the Legend of the White Sword series.
author: P.D. Kalnay
